<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Limited">[Bone Spray](/Spells.aspx?ID=1097)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 76</row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 15-foot cone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You fire a torrent of jagged bone shards from your hands, dealing 2d10 piercing damage and 1 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) to all creatures in the area.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The piercing damage increases by 1d10 and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.
